original_text: But you are only human. You have no authority to speak against God like that. God has made you. A pot cannot speak against the person who made it! It cannot ask him, ‘Why did you make me like this?’
korean_text: 이 사람아 네가 누구이기에 감히 하나님께 반문하느냐 지음을 받은 물건이 지은 자에게 어찌 나를 이같이 만들었느냐 말하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You have no authority to speak against God like that
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그렇게 하나님을 대항하여 말할 권위가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: A pot cannot speak against the person who made it
sentences.korean_translation: �그릇은 자신을 만든 사람에게 대항하여 말할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Why did you make me like this?
